title: Remove specific developer job cards from Careers Open Positions

requirements.summary: Filter the Careers page Open Positions rendering so job cards titled “Frontend Developer”, “Backend Developer”, and “Mobile App Developer” are not displayed on /careers.
acceptanceCriteria: On /careers, the Open Positions grid no longer displays job cards with titles “Frontend Developer”, “Backend Developer”, or “Mobile App Developer”.
Only the remaining job cards (e.g., the VLSI roles returned from the backend) are rendered in the Open Positions section.
No layout gaps or empty placeholders remain where the removed job cards previously appeared.

file_operations.description: Within the Open Positions section rendering, introduce a small title-based exclusion list for the three specified roles and derive a filtered jobs array used for (1) the empty-state check and (2) the jobs.map() that renders job cards, ensuring the excluded roles never produce cards or empty placeholders. Keep changes scoped to the Open Positions/job-card rendering only, without modifying layout, form fields, or other page sections.
